mapper.sql: ID id, system_ID systemId, module_name moduleName, GROUP_ID groupId,module_code moduleCode, dependency_system_module_ids dependencySystemModuleIds,ARTIFACT_ID artifactId, STATUS status, CREATE_BY createBy, CREATE_DATE createDate, LAST_UPDATE_BY lastUpdateBy, LAST_UPDATE_DATE lastUpdateDate,BUILD_DEPENDENCY buildDependency,BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE buildDependencySequence, COMPILE_COMMAND compileCommand,BUILD_TYPE buildType,RELEASE_REPOSITORY_NAME releaseRepositoryName,SNAPSHOT_REPOSITORY_NAME snapshotRepositoryName,BUILD_TOOL_VERSION buildToolVersion, PACKAGE_SUFFIX packageSuffix,JDK_VERSION jdkVersion,RELATIVE_PATH relativePath,FIRST_COMPILE_FLAG firstCompileFlag,SYSTEM_MODULE_FLAG systemModuleFlag
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system_module (system_ID, module_name, module_code, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, BUILD_DEPENDENCY,COMPILE_COMMAND,BUILD_TYPE,RELEASE_REPOSITORY_NAME,SNAPSHOT_REPOSITORY_NAME, BUILD_TOOL_VERSION,PACKAGE_SUFFIX,JDK_VERSION, BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE,CREATE_BY ,CREATE_DATE , LAST_UPDATE_BY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,RELATIVE_PATH,FIRST_COMPILE_FLAG,SYSTEM_MODULE_FLAG) values (#{systemId},#{moduleName},#{moduleCode},#{groupId},#{artifactId},#{buildDependency},#{compileCommand},#{buildType},#{releaseRepositoryName},#{snapshotRepositoryName}, #{buildToolVersion},#{packageSuffix},#{jdkVersion}, #{buildDependencySequence},#{createBy},#{createDate},#{lastUpdateBy},#{lastUpdateDate},#{relativePath},#{firstCompileFlag},#{systemModuleFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT module.ID id,module.module_code moduleCode,module.module_name moduleName,module.ARTIFACT_ID artifactId,module.GROUP_ID groupId,module.COMPILE_COMMAND compileCommand, module.BUILD_TYPE buildType,module.RELEASE_REPOSITORY_NAME releaseRepositoryName,module.SNAPSHOT_REPOSITORY_NAME snapshotRepositoryName, module.BUILD_TOOL_VERSION buildToolVersion,module.PACKAGE_SUFFIX packageSuffix,module.JDK_VERSION jdkVersion, module.BUILD_DEPENDENCY buildDependency,module.BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE buildDependencySequence ,module.SYSTEM_MODULE_FLAG systemModuleFlag, system.system_code systemCode,system.system_name systemName,module.system_Id systemId,module.RELATIVE_PATH relativePath,module.FIRST_COMPILE_FLAG firstCompileFlag FROM tbl_system_module module LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info system ON module.system_ID = system.ID WHERE module.ID = #{id}

select
from tbl_system_module where system_ID = #{id} and status=1 order by BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE is null,BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE

select
from tbl_system_module where SYSTEM_ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status=1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_system_module (ID, system_ID, module_name, module_code,dependency_system_module_ids, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dependencySystemModuleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update tbl_system_module
system_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_code = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dependency_system_module_ids = #{dependencySystemModuleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_DEPENDENCY = #{buildDependency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE = #{buildDependencySequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPILE_COMMAND = #{compileCommand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_TYPE = #{buildType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
RELEASE_REPOSITORY_NAME = #{releaseRepositoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNAPSHOT_REPOSITORY_NAME = #{snapshotRepositoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_TOOL_VERSION = #{buildToolVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_SUFFIX = #{packageSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RELATIVE_PATH = #{relativePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_COMPILE_FLAG = #{firstCompileFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_MODULE_FLAG = #{systemModuleFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_system_module set system_ID = #{systemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_code = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dependency_system_module_ids = #{dependencySystemModuleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_DEPENDENCY = #{buildDependency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_DEPENDENCY_SEQUENCE = #{buildDependencySequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPILE_COMMAND = #{compileCommand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_TYPE = #{buildType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, RELEASE_REPOSITORY_NAME = #{releaseRepositoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SNAPSHOT_REPOSITORY_NAME = #{snapshotRepositoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUILD_TOOL_VERSION = #{buildToolVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKAGE_SUFFIX = #{packageSuffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDK_VERSION = #{jdkVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_COMPILE_FLAG = #{firstCompileFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SYSTEM_MODULE_FLAG = #{systemModuleFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

from tbl_system_module where id in
#{id}
